back.title: love
back.description: 我爱你。 (Wǒ ài nǐ.) - I love you.

back.title: hobby
back.description: 你的爱好是什么？ (Nǐ de ài hào shì shén me?) - What is your hobby?

back.title: eight
back.description: 我有八本书。 (Wǒ yǒu bā běn shū.) - I have eight books.

back.title: dad, father
back.description: 我爸爸是老师。 (Wǒ bàba shì lǎo shī.) - My dad is a teacher.

back.title: particle
back.description: 我们走吧。 (Wǒmen zǒu ba.) - Let's go.

back.title: white
back.description: 她喜欢白色的衣服。 (Tā xǐhuān bái sè de yīfu.) - She likes white clothes.

back.title: daytime
back.description: 这里白天很热。 (Zhè lǐ bái tiān hěn rè.) - It's very hot here during the day.

back.title: hundred
back.description: 这个本子一百块。 (Zhè ge běn zi yì bǎi kuài.) - This notebook costs 100 yuan.

back.title: class, shift
back.description: 他在三班学习。 (Tā zài sān bān xué xí.) - He studies in class 3.

back.title: half
back.description: 我吃了半个面包。 (Wǒ chī le bàn ge miàn bāo.) - I ate half a bread.

back.title: half a year
back.description: 他在这里学习了半年。 (Tā zài zhè lǐ xué xí le bàn nián.) - He has been studying here for half a year.

back.title: half a day
back.description: 我在家休息了半天。 (Wǒ zài jiā xiūxi le bàn tiān.) - I rested at home for half a day.

back.title: to help
back.description: 我可以帮你吗？ (Wǒ kě yǐ bāng nǐ ma?) - Can I help you?

back.title: to help
back.description: 谢谢你来帮忙。 (Xiè xie nǐ lái bāng máng.) - Thanks for coming to help.

back.title: bag
back.description: 我的包很漂亮。 (Wǒ de bāo hěn piào liang.) - My bag is very beautiful.

back.title: steamed bun
back.description: 我喜欢吃包子。 (Wǒ xǐhuān chī bāo zi.) - I like to eat steamed buns.

back.title: cup (measure word)
back.description: 我要一杯咖啡。 (Wǒ yào yī bēi kāfēi.) - I want one cup of coffee.

back.title: cup
back.description: 这个杯子很漂亮。 (Zhè ge bēi zi hěn piào liang.) - This cup is very beautiful.

back.title: north
back.description: 我家在学校北边。 (Wǒ jiā zài xué xiào běi biān.) - My home is north of the school.

back.title: north side
back.description: 图书馆在学校的北边。 (Túshūguǎn zài xuéxiào de běibiān.) - The library is on the north side of the school.

back.title: Beijing
back.description: 北京是中国的首都。 (Běi jīng shì zhōng guó de shǒu dū.) - Beijing is the capital of China.

back.title: measure word for books
back.description: 这是一本书。 (Zhè shì yī běn shū.) - This is a book.

back.title: notebook
back.description: 这个本子是我的。 (Zhè ge běn zi shì wǒ de.) - This notebook is mine.

back.title: to compare, than
back.description: 她比我高。 (Tā bǐ wǒ gāo.) - She is taller than me.

back.title: don't, must not
back.description: 别说话。 (Bié shuō huà.) - Don't talk.

back.title: other
back.description: 你还有别的吗？ (Nǐ hái yǒu bié de ma?) - Do you have anything else?

back.title: other people
back.description: 不要去打扰别人。 (Bú yào qù dǎ rǎo bié rén.) - Don't go disturb others.

back.title: illness, to be sick
back.description: 他病了。 (Tā bìng le.) - He is sick.

back.title: patient
back.description: 医生在看病人。 (Yī shēng zài kàn bìng rén.) - The doctor is seeing the patient.

back.title: not big
back.description: 这个房间不大。 (Zhè ge fáng jiān bú dà.) - This room is not big.

back.title: wrong, incorrect
back.description: 你说的这个不对。 (Nǐ shuō de zhè ge bú duì.) - What you said is wrong.

back.title: you're welcome
back.description: A: 谢谢你！(Xiè xie nǐ!) - Thank you! B: 不客气！(Bú kè qì!) - You're welcome!

back.title: no need
back.description: 不用麻烦了。 (Bú yòng má fan le.) - No need to bother.

back.title: no, not
back.description: 我不是学生。 (Wǒ bú shì xué sheng.) - I am not a student.

back.title: vegetables, dish
back.description: 这道菜很好吃。 (Zhè dào cài hěn hǎo chī.) - This dish is very delicious.

back.title: tea
back.description: 我喜欢喝茶。 (Wǒ xǐ huān hē chá.) - I like to drink tea.

back.title: to lack, bad
back.description: 他的汉语很差。 (Tā de hàn yǔ hěn chà.) - His Chinese is very bad.

back.title: often
back.description: 我常去那家饭店。 (Wǒ cháng qù nà jiā fàn diàn.) - I often go to that restaurant.

back.title: often, frequently
back.description: 她常常看电影。 (Tā cháng cháng kàn diàn yǐng.) - She often watches movies.

back.title: to sing
back.description: 他喜欢唱歌。 (Tā xǐ huān chàng gē.) - He likes to sing.

back.title: to sing a song
back.description: 我喜欢唱歌。 (Wǒ xǐ huān chàng gē.) - I like singing.

back.title: car, vehicle
back.description: 我买了一辆新车。 (Wǒ mǎi le yī liàng xīn chē.) - I bought a new car.

back.title: ticket
back.description: 我有两张车票。 (Wǒ yǒu liǎng zhāng chē piào.) - I have two tickets.

back.title: on the bus/in the car
back.description: 我在车上等你。 (Wǒ zài chē shàng děng nǐ.) - I am waiting for you on the bus.

back.title: station, stop
back.description: 火车站很远。 (Huǒ chē zhàn hěn yuǎn.) - The train station is very far.

back.title: to eat
back.description: 我喜欢吃米饭。 (Wǒ xǐ huān chī mǐ fàn.) - I like to eat rice.

back.title: to eat a meal
back.description: 我们一起去吃饭吧。 (Wǒmen yì qǐ qù chī fàn ba.) - Let's go eat a meal together.

back.title: to go out
back.description: 太阳出来了。 (Tài yáng chū lái le.) - The sun has come out.

back.title: to come out
back.description: 他从房间里出来了。 (Tā cóng fáng jiān lǐ chū lái le.) - He came out of the room.

back.title: to go out
back.description: 我想出去走走。 (Wǒ xiǎng chū qù zǒu zǒu.) - I want to go out for a walk.

back.title: to wear, to put on
back.description: 她喜欢穿裙子。 (Tā xǐ huān chuān qún zi.) - She likes to wear skirts.

back.title: bed
back.description: 他躺在床上。 (Tā tǎng zài chuáng shàng.) - He is lying on the bed.

back.title: time (measure word)
back.description: 我来过这里一次。 (Wǒ lái guò zhè lǐ yī cì.) - I have been here once.

back.title: from
back.description: 我从中国来。 (Wǒ cóng zhōng guó lái.) - I am from China.

back.title: wrong
back.description: 你错了。 (Nǐ cuò le.) - You are wrong.

back.title: to hit, to play (ball)
back.description: 他打我。 (Tā dǎ wǒ.) - He hit me.

back.title: to take a taxi
back.description: 我们打车去吧。 (Wǒmen dǎ chē qù ba.) - Let's take a taxi.

back.title: to make a phone call
back.description: 妈妈在打电话。 (Māma zài dǎ diàn huà.) - Mom is on the phone.

back.title: to open
back.description: 请打开门。 (Qǐng dǎ kāi mén.) - Please open the door.

back.title: to play ball
back.description: 他们喜欢打球。 (Tā men xǐ huān dǎ qiú.) - They like playing ball.

back.title: big, large
back.description: 这个苹果很大。 (Zhè ge píng guǒ hěn dà.) - This apple is very big.

back.title: university
back.description: 他在北京的大学学习。 (Tā zài běi jīng de dà xué xué xí.) - He studies at a university in Beijing.

back.title: university student
back.description: 他是一个大学生。 (Tā shì yī ge dà xué shēng.) - He is a university student.

back.title: to arrive
back.description: 你到家了吗？ (Nǐ dào jiā le ma?) - Have you arrived home?

back.title: to get, to obtain
back.description: 我得到了一个礼物。 (Wǒ dé dào le yī ge lǐwù.) - I received a gift.

back.title: adverbial particle
back.description: 他高兴地笑了。 (Tā gāo xìng de xiào le.) - He smiled happily.

back.title: possessive particle
back.description: 这是我的书。 (Zhè shì wǒ de shū.) - This is my book.

back.title: to wait
back.description: 请等我一下。 (Qǐng děng wǒ yī xià.) - Please wait for me for a moment.

back.title: ground, earth
back.description: 地上有很多水。 (Dì shàng yǒu hěn duō shuǐ.) - There is a lot of water on the ground.

back.title: location
back.description: 开会的地点在哪里？ (Kāi huì de dì diǎn zài nǎ lǐ?) - Where is the location of the meeting?

back.title: place, space
back.description: 这个地方很漂亮。 (Zhè ge dì fang hěn piào liang.) - This place is very beautiful.

back.title: on the ground
back.description: 地上有一只笔。 (Dì shàng yǒu yī zhī bǐ.) - There is a pen on the ground.

back.title: map
back.description: 你有没有地图？ (Nǐ yǒu méi yǒu dì tú?) - Do you have a map?

back.title: younger brother
back.description: 我弟弟是学生。 (Wǒ dìdi shì xué sheng.) - My younger brother is a student.

back.title: ordinal prefix
back.description: 这是第一次。 (Zhè shì dì yī cì.) - This is the first time.

back.title: point, dot
back.description: 现在几点了？ (Xiàn zài jǐ diǎn le?) - What time is it now?

back.title: electricity
back.description: 这个地方没有电。 (Zhè ge dìfang méiyǒu diàn.) - This place has no electricity.

back.title: telephone
back.description: 你的电话号码是多少？ (Nǐ de diàn huà hào mǎ shì duō shǎo?) - What is your phone number?

back.title: computer
back.description: 我买了一个电脑。 (Wǒ mǎi le yī ge diàn nǎo.) - I bought a computer.

back.title: television
back.description: 他正在看电视。 (Tā zhèng zài kàn diàn shì.) - He is watching TV.

back.title: television set
back.description: 这个电视机坏了。 (Zhè ge diàn shì jī huài le.) - This TV set is broken.

back.title: movie, film
back.description: 我们一起去看电影吧。 (Wǒmen yì qǐ qù kàn diàn yǐng ba.) - Let's go watch a movie together.

back.title: movie theater
back.description: 这家电影院很新。 (Zhè jiā diàn yǐng yuàn hěn xīn.) - This movie theater is very new.

back.title: east
back.description: 太阳从东边出来。 (Tài yáng cóng dōng biān chū lái.) - The sun comes out from the east.

back.title: east side
back.description: 他在东边工作。 (Tā zài dōng biān gōng zuò.) - He works on the east side.

back.title: thing, stuff
back.description: 我想买点东西。 (Wǒ xiǎng mǎi diǎn dōng xi.) - I want to buy some things.

back.title: to move
back.description: 你的手可以动吗？ (Nǐ de shǒu kě yǐ dòng ma?) - Can your hand move?

back.title: action, movement
back.description: 他的动作很快。 (Tā de dòng zuò hěn kuài.) - His movements are very fast.

back.title: all, both
back.description: 我们都是中国人。 (Wǒmen dōu shì zhōng guó rén.) - We are all Chinese.

back.title: to read
back.description: 我喜欢读这本书。 (Wǒ xǐ huān dú zhè běn shū.) - I like to read this book.

back.title: to read, to study
back.description: 我每天都读书。 (Wǒ měi tiān dōu dú shū.) - I read books every day.

back.title: right, correct
back.description: 你说得对。 (Nǐ shuō de duì.) - What you said is correct.

back.title: I'm sorry
back.description: A: 对不起！(Duì bù qǐ!) - I'm sorry! B: 没关系。 (Méi guān xi.) - It's okay.

back.title: many, much
back.description: 这里有很多学生。 (Zhè lǐ yǒu hěn duō xué sheng.) - There are many students here.

back.title: how many, how much
back.description: 这件衣服多少钱？ (Zhè jiàn yī fu duō shǎo qián?) - How much does this clothing cost?

back.title: hungry
back.description: 我肚子饿了。 (Wǒ dù zi è le.) - I'm hungry.

back.title: son
back.description: 我有一个儿子。 (Wǒ yǒu yī ge ér zi.) - I have one son.

back.title: two
back.description: 我有两本书。 (Wǒ yǒu liǎng běn shū.) - I have two books.

back.title: meal, rice
back.description: 今天的饭很好吃。 (Jīn tiān de fàn hěn hǎo chī.) - Today's meal is very delicious.

back.title: restaurant, hotel
back.description: 我们去饭店吃饭吧。 (Wǒmen qù fàn diàn chī fàn ba.) - Let's go eat at the restaurant.

back.title: room
back.description: 这个房间很干净。 (Zhè ge fáng jiān hěn gān jìng.) - This room is very clean.

back.title: house
back.description: 他买了一套新房子。 (Tā mǎi le yī tào xīn fáng zi.) - He bought a new house.

back.title: to put, to let go
back.description: 请把书放在桌子上。 (Qǐng bǎ shū fàng zài zhuōzi shàng.) - Please put the book on the table.

back.title: to have a holiday
back.description: 我们放假了。 (Wǒmen fàng jià le.) - We are on holiday.

back.title: to finish school
back.description: 我们放学了。 (Wǒmen fàng xué le.) - We have finished school.

back.title: to fly
back.description: 这只鸟会飞。 (Zhè zhǐ niǎo huì fēi.) - This bird can fly.

back.title: airplane
back.description: 我喜欢坐飞机。 (Wǒ xǐ huān zuò fēi jī.) - I like to travel by airplane.

back.title: very, extremely
back.description: 这个电影非常好看。 (Zhè ge diàn yǐng fēi cháng hǎo kàn.) - This movie is very good.

back.title: minute, point (score)
back.description: 现在三点十分。 (Xiàn zài sān diǎn shí fēn.) - It's 3:10 now.

back.title: wind
back.description: 今天风很大。 (Jīn tiān fēng hěn dà.) - The wind is very strong today.

back.title: dry
back.description: 我的衣服干了。 (Wǒ de yī fu gān le.) - My clothes are dry.

back.title: clean
back.description: 我的房间很干净。 (Wǒ de fáng jiān hěn gān jìng.) - My room is very clean.

back.title: to do, to work
back.description: 你干什么呢？ (Nǐ gàn shén me ne?) - What are you doing?

back.title: what are you doing?
back.description: 你干什么呢？ (Nǐ gàn shén me ne?) - What are you doing?

back.title: high, tall
back.description: 我哥哥很高。 (Wǒ gēge hěn gāo.) - My older brother is very tall.

back.title: happy, glad
back.description: 我今天很高兴。 (Wǒ jīn tiān hěn gāo xìng.) - I am very happy today.

back.title: to tell
back.description: 请告诉我。 (Qǐng gào su wǒ.) - Please tell me.

back.title: elder brother
back.description: 我有一个哥哥。 (Wǒ yǒu yī ge gēge.) - I have an elder brother.

back.title: song
back.description: 这首歌很好听。 (Zhè shǒu gē hěn hǎo tīng.) - This song is very pleasant to listen to.

back.title: measure word
back.description: 我有一个朋友。 (Wǒ yǒu yī ge péng you.) - I have one friend.

back.title: to give
back.description: 我给你买了一件衣服。 (Wǒ gěi nǐ mǎi le yī jiàn yī fu.) - I bought a piece of clothing for you.

back.title: with
back.description: 我跟他一起吃饭。 (Wǒ gēn tā yì qǐ chī fàn.) - I ate with him.

back.title: worker
back.description: 他是一个工人。 (Tā shì yī ge gōng rén.) - He is a worker.

back.title: to work, job
back.description: 我爸爸工作很忙。 (Wǒ bàba gōng zuò hěn máng.) - My dad's job is very busy.

back.title: to close, to shut
back.description: 请关门。 (Qǐng guān mén.) - Please close the door.

back.title: to close
back.description: 请把窗户关上。 (Qǐng bǎ chuāng hu guān shàng.) - Please close the window.

back.title: expensive
back.description: 这个手机很贵。 (Zhè ge shǒu jī hěn guì.) - This phone is very expensive.

back.title: country
back.description: 中国是一个很大的国。 (Zhōng guó shì yī ge hěn dà de guó.) - China is a very large country.

back.title: country, nation
back.description: 你喜欢哪个国家？ (Nǐ xǐ huān nǎ ge guó jiā?) - Which country do you like?

back.title: abroad
back.description: 他住在国外。 (Tā zhù zài guó wài.) - He lives abroad.

back.title: past experience particle
back.description: 我没去过北京。 (Wǒ méi qù guò běi jīng.) - I have not been to Beijing.

back.title: still, yet
back.description: 我还在吃饭。 (Wǒ hái zài chī fàn.) - I am still eating.

back.title: or (in a question)
back.description: 你喝茶还是喝咖啡？ (Nǐ hē chá hái shì hē kāfēi?) - Do you drink tea or coffee?

back.title: also, in addition
back.description: 我买了苹果，还有香蕉。 (Wǒ mǎi le píngguǒ, hái yǒu xiāng jiāo.) - I bought apples, and also bananas.

back.title: child, children
back.description: 她有两个孩子。 (Tā yǒu liǎng ge hái zi.) - She has two children.

back.title: Chinese language
back.description: 我喜欢学习汉语。 (Wǒ xǐ huān xué xí hàn yǔ.) - I like learning Chinese.

back.title: Chinese character
back.description: 我不会写汉字。 (Wǒ bú huì xiě hàn zì.) - I can't write Chinese characters.

back.title: good, well
back.description: 他是一个好人。 (Tā shì yī ge hǎo rén.) - He is a good person.

back.title: delicious, tasty
back.description: 这个菜真好吃。 (Zhè ge cài zhēn hǎo chī.) - This dish is really delicious.

back.title: good-looking, beautiful
back.description: 这个电影很好看。 (Zhè ge diàn yǐng hěn hǎo kàn.) - This movie is very good to watch.

back.title: pleasant to hear
back.description: 这首歌很好听。 (Zhè shǒu gē hěn hǎo tīng.) - This song is very pleasant to listen to.

back.title: fun, amusing
back.description: 这个游戏很好玩儿。 (Zhè ge yóu xì hěn hǎo wánr.) - This game is very fun.

back.title: number, date
back.description: 今天是八号。 (Jīn tiān shì bā hào.) - Today is the 8th.

back.title: to drink
back.description: 你想喝什么？ (Nǐ xiǎng hē shén me?) - What do you want to drink?

back.title: and
back.description: 我喜欢你和我。 (Wǒ xǐ huān nǐ hé wǒ.) - I like you and me.

back.title: very
back.description: 我很好。 (Wǒ hěn hǎo.) - I am very well.

back.title: back, behind, after
back.description: 我在你后面。 (Wǒ zài nǐ hòu mian.) - I am behind you.

back.title: behind
back.description: 他坐在我后边。 (Tā zuò zài wǒ hòu biān.) - He is sitting behind me.

back.title: the day after tomorrow
back.description: 我后天去北京。 (Wǒ hòu tiān qù běi jīng.) - I will go to Beijing the day after tomorrow.

back.title: flower
back.description: 这束花很漂亮。 (Zhè shù huā hěn piào liang.) - This bouquet of flowers is very beautiful.

back.title: word, talk
back.description: 他的话很有道理。 (Tā de huà hěn yǒu dàolǐ.) - What he said makes a lot of sense.

back.title: bad, broken
back.description: 我的电脑坏了。 (Wǒ de diàn nǎo huài le.) - My computer is broken.

back.title: to return, to give back
back.description: 请把书还给我。 (Qǐng bǎ shū huán gěi wǒ.) - Please return the book to me.

back.title: to return, to go back
back.description: 我回家了。 (Wǒ huí jiā le.) - I went back home.

back.title: to answer
back.description: 请回答我的问题。 (Qǐng huí dá wǒ de wèn tí.) - Please answer my question.

back.title: to return to
back.description: 他回到家了。 (Tā huí dào jiā le.) - He returned home.

back.title: to go home
back.description: 你什么时候回家？ (Nǐ shén me shí hou huí jiā?) - When are you going home?

back.title: to come back
back.description: 他什么时候回来？ (Tā shén me shí hou huí lái?) - When will he come back?

back.title: to go back
back.description: 我明天要回去。 (Wǒ míng tiān yào huí qù.) - I need to go back tomorrow.

back.title: can, to be able to
back.description: 我会说汉语。 (Wǒ huì shuō hàn yǔ.) - I can speak Chinese.

back.title: train
back.description: 我坐火车去北京。 (Wǒ zuò huǒ chē qù běi jīng.) - I will take the train to Beijing.

back.title: airport
back.description: 我明天去机场。 (Wǒ míng tiān qù jī chǎng.) - I will go to the airport tomorrow.

back.title: airplane ticket
back.description: 你有机票吗？ (Nǐ yǒu jī piào ma?) - Do you have an airplane ticket?

back.title: egg
back.description: 我早上吃了一个鸡蛋。 (Wǒ zǎo shang chī le yī ge jī dàn.) - I ate one egg this morning.

back.title: how many
back.description: 你家有几个人？ (Nǐ jiā yǒu jǐ ge rén?) - How many people are in your family?

back.title: to remember, to record
back.description: 我记不住。 (Wǒ jì bú zhù.) - I can't remember it.

back.title: to remember
back.description: 我记得他。 (Wǒ jì de tā.) - I remember him.

back.title: to memorize
back.description: 请记住我的话。 (Qǐng jì zhù wǒ de huà.) - Please remember my words.

back.title: home, family
back.description: 我们回家吧。 (Wǒ men huí jiā ba.) - Let's go home.

back.title: at home, inside the house
back.description: 家里有人吗？ (Jiā lǐ yǒu rén ma?) - Is there anyone at home?

back.title: family members
back.description: 我们是一家人。 (Wǒmen shì yī jiā rén.) - We are a family.

back.title: between, among
back.description: 他们两个人之间有问题。 (Tā men liǎng ge rén zhī jiān yǒu wèn tí.) - There is a problem between the two of them.

back.title: to see, to meet
back.description: 你见过他吗？ (Nǐ jiàn guò tā ma?) - Have you met him?

back.title: to meet
back.description: 很高兴见到你。 (Hěn gāo xìng jiàn dào nǐ.) - It's nice to meet you.

back.title: to teach
back.description: 老师教我们中文。 (Lǎo shī jiāo wǒmen zhōng wén.) - The teacher teaches us Chinese.

back.title: to be called, to call
back.description: 你叫什么名字？ (Nǐ jiào shén me míng zi?) - What is your name?

back.title: teaching building
back.description: 我们的教学楼很大。 (Wǒmen de jiāo xué lóu hěn dà.) - Our teaching building is very big.

back.title: elder sister
back.description: 我姐姐很漂亮。 (Wǒ jiějie hěn piào liang.) - My older sister is very beautiful.

back.title: to introduce
back.description: 请你介绍一下。 (Qǐng nǐ jiè shào yī xià.) - Please introduce yourself.

back.title: this year
back.description: 我今年十六岁。 (Wǒ jīn nián shí liù suì.) - I am sixteen years old this year.

back.title: today
back.description: 我今天很忙。 (Wǒ jīn tiān hěn máng.) - I am very busy today.

back.title: to enter
back.description: 请进。 (Qǐng jìn.) - Please come in.

back.title: to come in
back.description: 请你进来。 (Qǐng nǐ jìn lái.) - Please come in.

back.title: to go in
back.description: 他进去了。 (Tā jìn qù le.) - He went inside.

back.title: nine
back.description: 他九点来。 (Tā jiǔ diǎn lái.) - He will come at nine o'clock.

back.title: then, just
back.description: 你来了，我就走。 (Nǐ lái le, wǒ jiù zǒu.) - Once you arrive, I will leave.

back.title: to feel, to think
back.description: 我觉得他很好。 (Wǒ jué de tā hěn hǎo.) - I think he is very good.

back.title: to open, to drive
back.description: 请开门。 (Qǐng kāi mén.) - Please open the door.

back.title: to drive a car
back.description: 他会开车。 (Tā huì kāi chē.) - He knows how to drive.

back.title: to have a meeting
back.description: 我们明天开会。 (Wǒmen míng tiān kāi huì.) - We have a meeting tomorrow.

back.title: to joke, to kid
back.description: 别开玩笑了。 (Bié kāi wán xiào le.) - Stop joking.

back.title: to see, to look at
back.description: 我想看这本书。 (Wǒ xiǎng kàn zhè běn shū.) - I want to read this book.

back.title: to see a doctor
back.description: 我生病了，要去看病。 (Wǒ shēng bìng le, yào qù kàn bìng.) - I'm sick and need to see a doctor.

back.title: to see, to catch sight of
back.description: 你看到他了吗？ (Nǐ kàn dào tā le ma?) - Did you see him?

back.title: to see, to notice
back.description: 我看见你了。 (Wǒ kàn jiàn nǐ le.) - I saw you.

back.title: to test, to examine
back.description: 老师要考我们。 (Lǎo shī yào kǎo wǒ men.) - The teacher is going to test us.

back.title: exam, test
back.description: 明天有考试。 (Míng tiān yǒu kǎo shì.) - There is an exam tomorrow.

back.title: thirsty
back.description: 我渴了，想喝水。 (Wǒ kě le, xiǎng hē shuǐ.) - I'm thirsty, I want to drink water.

back.title: class, lesson
back.description: 我今天有汉语课。 (Wǒ jīn tiān yǒu hàn yǔ kè.) - I have a Chinese class today.

back.title: textbook
back.description: 我的课本在书包里。 (Wǒ de kè běn zài shū bāo lǐ.) - My textbook is in my backpack.

back.title: text of a lesson
back.description: 我们学习这篇课文。 (Wǒmen xué xí zhè piān kè wén.) - We are studying this lesson text.

back.title: mouth
back.description: 请张开你的口。 (Qǐng zhāng kāi nǐ de kǒu.) - Please open your mouth.

back.title: piece, lump (measure word)
back.description: 一块钱。 (Yī kuài qián.) - One yuan.

back.title: fast, quick
back.description: 你走得太快了。 (Nǐ zǒu de tài kuài le.) - You are walking too fast.

back.title: to come
back.description: 我来中国了。 (Wǒ lái zhōng guó le.) - I have come to China.

back.title: to arrive at
back.description: 他来到我的家。 (Tā lái dào wǒ de jiā.) - He arrived at my house.

back.title: old
back.description: 他很老了。 (Tā hěn lǎo le.) - He is very old.

back.title: elderly person
back.description: 她是一个老人。 (Tā shì yī ge lǎo rén.) - She is an elderly person.

back.title: teacher
back.description: 老师，您好。 (Lǎo shī, nín hǎo.) - Hello, teacher.

back.title: completion particle
back.description: 我吃了。 (Wǒ chī le.) - I have eaten.
